title: LOEWE Esencia EDP 150ml
description: LOEWE Esencia is a family of fragrances inspired by DNA, the code of life – a pattern that defines each of us as individual – universal yet unique.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Debod' 150ml
description: Mysterious and exotic, LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid Debod is inspired by Madrid’s atmospheric Templo de Debod—an Ancient Egyptian temple rebuilt in the Cuartel de la Montaña park. The floral, ambery and woody fragrance features notes of rose, oud and saffron.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Mayrit' 150ml
description: Enigmatic and timeless, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Mayrit is inspired by the restless spirit of Arabian Madrid—then-named ‘Mayrit’—in the 4th Century. The fragrance features notes of orange blossom, jasmine and amber.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Ópera' 150ml
description: Emotive and singular, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Ópera is inspired by dramatic performances at Madrid’s Teatro Real opera house. The fragrance features powdery, woody notes of jasmine petals, sandalwood and vanilla.

title: LOEWE Esencia EDT 200ml
description: LOEWE Esencia EDT, the original fragrance, now in a colourful new bottle, forming part of LOEWE's Botanical Rainbow.

title: LOEWE Paula's Ibiza Eau de Toilette 50ml
description: A floral, acquatic and ambery Eau de Toilette for men and women, created by Jonathan Anderson and LOEWE’s in-house perfumer Nuria Cruelles.

pros.text: Unique and evocative summer atmospheric scent
Excellent longevity and performance for an EDT
Fresh, earthy green and woody profile
Linear with a whole new smell
Niche quality scent at designer price point
Realistic coconut water, not typical sunscreen

cons.text: May not fit everyone's skin
Vegetal opening can resemble green peppers
Earthy notes may smell damp or swampy
Bodily, salty-skin facets can smell like sweat
Highly polarizing; not a safe blind buy
Performance varies significantly between users
Prominent galbanum may be too sharp for some

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'San Miguel' 150ml
description: Eclectic and unique, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid San Miguel is inspired by the vibrant energy of Madrid’s San Miguel market. The fragrance features notes of bergamot, pear and patchouli.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'La Bella Cibeles' 150ml
description: Delicate and sparkling, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid La Bella Cibeles is inspired by the sculptural fountain at Madrid’s Plaza de Cibeles. The fragrance features notes of rose, iris, vanilla and musk.

title: LOEWE 001 Woman Eau de Toilette 50ml
description: LOEWE 001 is a family of fragrances inspired by new beginnings and early morning light. Fragrances to share.

title: LOEWE 001 Man Eau de Toilette 50ml
description: LOEWE 001 is a family of fragrances inspired by new beginnings and early morning light. Fragrances to share.

title: LOEWE Aura White Magnolia 100ml
description: LOEWE Aura is a family of fragrances inspired by the aura of an inspiring muse: illuminating, generous and extrovert. Fragrances to illuminate.

pros.text: Versatile for daily wear across seasons
Modern, high-end take on white florals
Smooth blend of citrus and sugary vanilla
Long-lasting performance on skin and clothes

cons.text: Short shelf life with potential to spoil
Overly sweet and cloying in heat
Triggers headaches for scent-sensitive users
Reminiscent of cheaper mass-market fragrances
Heavy opening can be overwhelming
Artificial, screechy, or synthetic undertones
Linear development lacking scent complexity
High price point for simple composition
Generic and unoriginal scent profile

title: LOEWE Aura Pink Magnolia 30ml
description: LOEWE Aura is a family of fragrances inspired by the aura of an inspiring muse: illuminating, generous and extrovert. Fragrances to illuminate.

pros.text: High essential oil concentration ensures excellent longevity
Musk tickles the nose like champagne bubbles
Consistent linear scent without traditional development
Luxurious bottle features real gold brushstrokes

cons.text: Not unisex, more feminine in nature
Too sweet and cloying
Polarizing association with scented feminine hygiene products
Can be headache-inducing due to high potency
Synthetic red fruit notes can smell medicinal
Not much like magnolia

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Doré' 100ml
description: Evocative and compelling, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Doré is inspired by archive screenings at Madrid’s iconic, modernist Doré cinema. The fragrance features floral, aromatic and woody notes of patchouli and vainilla.

title: LOEWE Paula's Ibiza Cosmic 50ml
description: LOEWE Paula’s Ibiza Cosmic is a fruity, woody and ambery Eau de Parfum for men and women, created by LOEWE's in-house perfumier, Nuria Cruelles.

pros.text: Affordable alternative to expensive niche fragrances
Versatile for both warm and cool weather
Unique fruity profile without salty notes
Perfect relaxed beach and vacation scent
Creamy tropical coconut and sandalwood drydown

cons.text: Inconsistent longevity; performance varies significantly
Divisive profile; not a safe blind buy
Reminiscent of generic drugstore body sprays
Mango and coconut notes sometimes imperceptible
Linear development feels boring to some
Perceived as overpriced for the quantity
Causes quick olfactory fatigue or nose blindness
Leans feminine, especially in the opening
Sandalwood note may smell like pickle juice
Initial spray smells synthetic or like shampoo

title: Masculine Sample Box
description:
This 6 x 1.5 ml Sample Set is designed to help you explore LOEWE Perfumes directly from home and discover your new signature scent.

If you decide to buy a full size Perfume after buying a Sample Box, you will receive a 10% discount on your purchase.

title: LOEWE 7 Cobalt 50ml
description: LOEWE 7 is a family of fragrances inspired by the furthest reaches of outer space, a sense of eternal mystery.

pros.text: Exceptional fresh, clean, and soapy profile
Perfect balance of classic and modern vibes
Aromatic and earthy with a smoky finish
Natural note of sage with tarty black currant
Expertly blends traditional and contemporary perfumery
Sophisticated alternative to Bleu de Chanel

cons.text: Not similar to Anonimo as advertised
Lacks the characteristic incense DNA of Loewe 7
Modern bottle design feels generic to some

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Prado' 100ml
description: Evocative and compelling, the name of LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Prado pays tribute to the Prado Museum—a destination for classical European art—and the Spanish word for ‘meadow’, evoking an escape into elysian nature. Echoing the emotive, elegiac landscape paintings that hang in the museum’s galleries, the scent is an harmonious composition featuring aromatic, woody and ambery notes of chamomile, clary sage, cassis and lychee.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Prado' 150ml
description: Evocative and compelling, the name of LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Prado pays tribute to the Prado Museum—a destination for classical European art—and the Spanish word for ‘meadow’, evoking an escape into elysian nature. Echoing the emotive, elegiac landscape paintings that hang in the museum’s galleries, the scent is an harmonious composition featuring aromatic, woody and ambery notes of chamomile, clary sage, cassis and lychee.

description: Evocative and enchanting, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Casa de Campo pays tribute to the Casa de Campo park, once a royal hunting estate, now a verdant oasis for all Madrilenians. Abundant with natural beauty, trees, water and wildlife, it is a beloved space for rest and relaxation. The fragrance features floral, woody and musky notes of artemisia and sandalwood, underlined by the resinous complexity of the LOEWE Accord.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Casa de Campo' 150ml
description: Evocative and enchanting, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Casa de Campo pays tribute to the Casa de Campo park, once a royal hunting estate, now a verdant oasis for all Madrilenians. Abundant with natural beauty, trees, water and wildlife, it is a beloved space for rest and relaxation. The fragrance features floral, woody and musky notes of artemisia and sandalwood, underlined by the resinous complexity of the LOEWE Accord.

title: LOEWE Roasted Vanilla EDP 100ml
description: LOEWE Roasted Vanilla is part of the LOEWE Crafted Collection: Sensual and addictive, Roasted Vanilla reveals the alluring complexity of vanilla, whose warmth and creaminess are deepened and grounded by oakwood.

title: LOEWE Earth EDP 50ml
description:
LOEWE Earth EDP is the first in a new family of fragrances to join the Botanical Rainbow, unifying the collection’s kaleidoscope of colour with its vibrant mauve bottle.

LOEWE Earth is inspired by the elements that connect nature, propelling life above and below the ground, from the atmospheric to the tangible, the visible to the invisible, unifying inner and outer worlds.

pros.text: Versatile across different styles and genders
Perfect for rainy autumn and spring
Lasts up to 10 hours on skin
Realistic, juicy pear and violet notes

cons.text: Truffle note is difficult to detect
Smells like generic men's shower gel
Overpriced for the actual performance
Intimate projection and low sillage
Extremely poor longevity for many users
Misleading name; lacks prominent earthy notes
Generic masculine dry down on skin
Triggers headaches for sensitive users
Boring and unremarkable scent profile
Polarizing bitter or moldy undertones

title: LOEWE Bittersweet Oud EDP 100ml
description: LOEWE Bittersweet Oud is part of the LOEWE Crafted Collection: Opulent and enigmatic, Bittersweet Oud explores the mystical richness of oud, amplifying its resinous, woody depth through a vibrant interplay of contrasts.

title: LOEWE Solo Elixir 50ml
description: Balanced and contemporary, the LOEWE Solo Elixir EDP reinterprets and amplifies the original LOEWE Solo fragrance with a higher, more resonant concentration of essential oils. LOEWE Solo Elixir reveals aromatic, floral and ambery notes of lavender, jasmine sambac, mandarin and orris combined with nutmeg, cinnamon, olibanum and patchouli.

cons.text: Polarizing and unconventional profile
Strays too far from original EDT
Disappointing performance for an Elixir
Not a safe blind buy

Weak projection after 15 minutes

Dry, bitter pencil-shaving scent
Harsh, medicinal alcoholic opening
Expensive for the performance offered

title: LOEWE Paula's Ibiza Eclectic 100ml
description: A woody, floral and gourmand new Eau de Toilette for men and women, created by LOEWE’s in-house perfumier, Nuria Cruelles.

pros.text: Unique blend of spicy, floral, and resinous notes
Great for those who don't like fresh or super sweet fragrances
Juicy with hints of orange, orange blossom, and jasmine sambac
Exceptional longevity for an Eau de Toilette
Creamy lotion-like texture without typical sunscreen clichés

cons.text: Not as coconutty as some may expect
Less green than the original Paula's Ibiza fragrance
Slight incense note might not be enough for those who like stronger incense scents
Dries down to a vintage, powdery makeup scent
Indolic jasmine and heavy ylang may polarize
Noticeable, sharp black pepper in the opening

title: LOEWE Paula's Ibiza Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: A floral, acquatic and ambery Eau de Toilette for men and women, created by Jonathan Anderson and LOEWE’s in-house perfumer Nuria Cruelles.

pros.text: Unique and evocative summer atmospheric scent
Excellent longevity and performance for an EDT
Fresh, earthy green and woody profile
Linear with a whole new smell
Niche quality scent at designer price point
Realistic coconut water, not typical sunscreen

cons.text: May not fit everyone's skin
Vegetal opening can resemble green peppers
Earthy notes may smell damp or swampy
Bodily, salty-skin facets can smell like sweat
Highly polarizing; not a safe blind buy
Performance varies significantly between users
Prominent galbanum may be too sharp for some

title: Paula’s Ibiza Eclectic Body Lotion
description: Body lotion from the Paula’s Ibiza range, with a refreshing feel, made to infuse your bathing ritual with Balearic fragrance. Featuring natural ingredients with skin-hydrating properties, this lotion perfumes the body with the floral, woody and gourmand scent of Eclectic. Apply liberally and allow to sink in for fragrant, fresh and summer-ready skin.

pros.text: Unique blend of spicy, floral, and resinous notes
Great for those who don't like fresh or super sweet fragrances
Juicy with hints of orange, orange blossom, and jasmine sambac
Exceptional longevity for an Eau de Toilette
Creamy lotion-like texture without typical sunscreen clichés

cons.text: Not as coconutty as some may expect
Less green than the original Paula's Ibiza fragrance
Slight incense note might not be enough for those who like stronger incense scents
Dries down to a vintage, powdery makeup scent
Indolic jasmine and heavy ylang may polarize
Noticeable, sharp black pepper in the opening

title: LOEWE Earth Elixir 50ml
description:
Expansive and contemporary, LOEWE Earth Elixir reinterprets and amplifies the original LOEWE Earth EDP with a higher, more resonant concentration of essential oils.

The scent reveals floral, ambery and musky notes of truffle, pear and oud combined with elemi, mimosa and violet, underlined by the rich, raw and authentic aspects of the LOEWE Accord—a new note based on the complex, resinous scent of the Spanish Rockrose wildflower—LOEWE’s fragrant DNA.

pros.text: True unisex appeal for all genders
Distinctive blend of truffles and pear
Superior performance compared to Gris Dior

cons.text: Conflicting perceptions of scent notes
Becomes a skin scent too quickly
Lacks impact for clubbing environments
Unsuitable for hot summer weather
Opening can feel sharp or acidic
Inconsistent longevity reports between users
Polarizing damp earth and mushroom notes
High price point for the volume
Drydown less impressive than the opening
Synthetic violet nuances for some

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Debod' 100ml
description: Mysterious and exotic, LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid Debod is inspired by Madrid’s atmospheric Templo de Debod—an Ancient Egyptian temple rebuilt in the Cuartel de la Montaña park. The floral, ambery and woody fragrance features notes of rose, oud and saffron.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Rosaleda' 100ml
description: Floral and harmonious, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Rosaleda is inspired by the serenity of the landscaped rose gardens in Madrid’s El Retiro park. The fragrance features notes of rose and musk.

title: LOEWE Esencia EDP 150ml Gift Set
description: This exclusive Gift Set includes: LOEWE Esencia EDP 150ml, a matching LOEWE Esencia EDP 10 ml vial and a complementary 10ml vial of LOEWE Esencia Elixir.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'San Miguel' 100ml
description: Eclectic and unique, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid San Miguel is inspired by the vibrant energy of Madrid’s San Miguel market. The fragrance features notes of bergamot, pear and patchouli.

title: LOEWE Esencia Elixir 50ml
description: LOEWE Esencia Elixir EDP expands on the original LOEWE Esencia EDP fragrance with a higher concentration of essential oils that leave a resonant trail in their wake. Singular and robust, LOEWE Esencia Elixir EDP blends woody notes with herbs and smoky leather for a captivating impression. Its aromatic scent includes notes of patchouli, vetiver and amber.

Cloying if applied heavily

description:
LOEWE Solo Ella Elixir EDP expands on the original LOEWE Solo Ella EDP scent, with a higher concentration of essential oils that leave a resonant trail in their wake.

Transgressive and modern, LOEWE Solo Ella Elixir EDP reveals delicate notes that combine floral accords with spices and woods. Its fruity floral scent includes notes of pear, tuberose, sandalwood and musk.

title: Feminine Sample Box
description:
This 6 x 1.5 ml Sample Set is designed to help you explore LOEWE Perfumes directly from home and discover your new signature scent.

If you decide to buy a full size Perfume after buying a Sample Box, you will receive a 10% discount on your purchase.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'La Bella Cibeles' 100ml
description: Delicate and sparkling, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid La Bella Cibeles is inspired by the sculptural fountain at Madrid’s Plaza de Cibeles. The fragrance features notes of rose, iris, vanilla and musk.

title: Home Scents Best Sellers Sample Set
description:
Explore the botanical aromas of our Home Scents fragrances from the comfort of home. The Home Scents Best Sellers sample set is composed of 5 wax scented tablets.

If you decide to buy a full size item after buying a Home Scents Sample Set, you will receive a 10% discount on your purchase.

title: LOEWE Aire Anthesis 50ml
description:
LOEWE Aire Anthesis Eau de Parfum is the first fragrance in the Botanical Rainbow to feature the exclusive ‘LOEWE Accord’— a newly created olfactory note crafted by our in-house nose, Nuria Cruelles, to express LOEWE’s unique identity.


LOEWE Aire is a family of fragrances, inspired by the fresh and pure air all around us—elemental, uplifting and life-giving.

pros.text: Clean, fresh, and watery scent profile
Pleasant floral and sandalwood dry down
Excellent for spring and summer daytime
Invigorating tart pear and rhubarb notes
Office-safe and professional for daily wear

cons.text: Leans significantly feminine rather than unisex
Underwhelming projection after the initial opening
Mature or dated scent profile
Off-putting saliva-like sour note
Headache-inducing sweetness in some conditions
Stale, swampy, or stagnant water facets
Sharp, metallic, or overly sour dry down
Generic laundry detergent or deodorant smell
Poor longevity, fading after two hours
High price point for the value

title: LOEWE 7 Elixir 50ml
description:
Mysterious and original, LOEWE 7 Elixir reinterprets and amplifies the original LOEWE 7 EDP with a higher, more resonant concentration of essential oils.

The scent reveals intense notes of patchouli, red pepper berries and amber, underlined by the rich, raw and authentic aspects of the LOEWE Accord—a new note based on the complex, resinous scent of the Spanish Rockrose wildflower—LOEWE’s fragrant DNA.

pros.text: Versatile for formal and casual occasions
Great signature scent for office environments
Ideal for autumn and winter evenings
Deep, balsamic, and rich patchouli base
More complex than previous Loewe 7 flankers
Refined blend of original 7 and Anonimo
Sophisticated woody incense and spice profile

cons.text: Medicinal qualities reminiscent of herbal balms
Polarizing scent profile lacks universal appeal
High price point for a designer fragrance
Omission of original's signature apple note
Too heavy for warm summer weather
Redundant for owners of Loewe 7 Anonimo
Harsh, metallic, or screechy drydown
Challenging, animalic, or ammonia-like opening
Perceived as redundant to niche alternatives
Lacks original character of the classic line

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Mayrit' 100ml
description: Enigmatic and timeless, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Mayrit is inspired by the restless spirit of Arabian Madrid—then-named ‘Mayrit’—in the 4th Century. The fragrance features notes of orange blossom, jasmine and amber.

title: Duo Set 001
description: A curated pack of two complementary fragrances designed to be shared: one for her and one for him —LOEWE 001 Woman EDT and LOEWE 001 Man EDT—in 75ml sizes. Create a unique, shared olfactory experience with a harmonious combination of the two perfumes. As fragrances with shared notes and harmonious formulations, the two scents can either be layered together directly on the skin, be worn alternately at different times of day, or be worn by partners simultaneously to create a special ‘third’ fragrance.

title: LOEWE SOLO EDT 15ml vial
description: LOEWE SOLO EDT in a 15ml vial, ideal for taking out and about with you, in your handbag, or off on your travels.

title: LOEWE Aire EDT 150ml Gift Set
description: This exclusive Gift Set includes: LOEWE Aire EDT 150ml, a matching LOEWE Aire EDT 10 ml vial and a complementary 10ml vial of LOEWE Solo Ella Elixir.

pros.text: Ideal for hot summer Mediterranean climates
Versatile for office and everyday wear

cons.text: Overwhelming, dense oakmoss and aldehydes
Limited availability outside of Spain
Performance varies greatly with body chemistry
Prominent, dated vintage aesthetic
Harsh, bitter, or medicinal notes
Overly powdery and mature dry down
Smells like industrial soap or cleanser

Austere and cold personality
Prickly in extreme temperature shifts

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Ópera' 100ml
description: Emotive and singular, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Ópera is inspired by dramatic performances at Madrid’s Teatro Real opera house. The fragrance features powdery, woody notes of jasmine petals, sandalwood and vanilla.

title: LOEWE 7 Cobalt Monochromatic 50ml
description:
LOEWE 7 is a family of fragrances inspired by the furthest reaches of outer space, a sense of
eternal mystery.

pros.text: Exceptional fresh, clean, and soapy profile
Perfect balance of classic and modern vibes
Aromatic and earthy with a smoky finish
Natural note of sage with tarty black currant
Expertly blends traditional and contemporary perfumery
Sophisticated alternative to Bleu de Chanel

cons.text: Not similar to Anonimo as advertised
Lacks the characteristic incense DNA of Loewe 7
Modern bottle design feels generic to some

title: LOEWE Iris Root EDP 100ml
description: LOEWE Iris Root is part of the LOEWE Crafted Collection: Powdery and nuanced, Iris Root explores the hidden beauty of the iris rhizome, known for its creamy smoothness and poised elegance.

title: LOEWE Solo Vulcan EDP 50ml
description: Aromatic and singular, LOEWE Solo Vulcan EDP combines the rich, warm aroma of the new LOEWE Accord with notes of thyme, lavender, orange flower absolute and vetiver to create a balsamic, woody, herbal and fresh fragrance.

pros.text: Excellent longevity, lasting up to 9 hours
Distinctive, original alternative to mainstream trends
Ideal for spring and mild summer days
Evocative Mediterranean herbal and balsamic character
Engaging evolution from floral to resinous base
High-quality natural floral and herbal notes
Highly versatile for daily and office wear

title: Wood Case
description:
Make your Fragrances To Go vials more durable, portable and beautiful with this protective case, crafted in ash wood and 100% organic cork.

The case has a seamless assembly system inspired by the Japanese Isukatsu technique, used by craftsmen to build furniture without glue or nails.

title: LOEWE Agua Drop EDP 50ml
description: Refreshing and floral, LOEWE Agua Drop EDP combines the rich, warm aroma of the new LOEWE Accord with notes of bergamot and orange flower absolute to create a fresh, fruity and woody ambery fragrance.

pros.text: Excellent for high heat and summer days
Refined clean aesthetic for professional settings
Unique herbal character from absinthe accord
Versatile unisex profile for most occasions

title: LOEWE Esencia EDP - Monochromatic 50ml
description: LOEWE Esencia is a family of fragrances inspired by DNA, the code of life – a pattern that defines each of us as individual – universal yet unique.

title: LOEWE Earth x Lladró
description:
This limited-edition flask of LOEWE Earth EDP has been created in collaboration between LOEWE Perfumes and Spanish ceramics brand, Lladró.
The signature LOEWE block-shaped flask is crafted in mauve glass, topped by a handcrafted, porcelain flower cap, hand-painted in pink, with a pale green calyx.

title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Rosaleda' 150ml
description: Floral and harmonious, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Rosaleda is inspired by the serenity of the landscaped rose gardens in Madrid’s El Retiro park. The fragrance features notes of rose and musk.

title: LOEWE Solo Vulcan EDP 100ml
description: Aromatic and singular, LOEWE Solo Vulcan EDP combines the rich, warm aroma of the new LOEWE Accord with notes of thyme, lavender, orange flower absolute and vetiver to create a balsamic, woody, herbal and fresh fragrance.

pros.text: Excellent longevity, lasting up to 9 hours
Distinctive, original alternative to mainstream trends
Ideal for spring and mild summer days
Evocative Mediterranean herbal and balsamic character
Engaging evolution from floral to resinous base
High-quality natural floral and herbal notes
Highly versatile for daily and office wear

cons.text: Sharp soapy or acidic notes can sting
Becomes cloying and intolerable if oversprayed
Not a safe blind buy candidate
Divisive and potentially offensive scent profile
Harsh, synthetic, or suffocating opening
Overpriced for a designer-market fragrance
Lacks original Solo line DNA
Unpleasant dusty or musty earthy undertones
Performance varies significantly between users
Aggressive sweetness unsuitable for high heat
Mature, old-school barbershop vibe for some

title: Duo Set
description: A curated pack of two complementary fragrances for her—LOEWE Aire Sutileza and LOEWE Solo Ella EDP—in 50ml sizes. Stimulating an attitude of play and personalisation, the Duo Set encourages each wearer to experiment and express themselves more freely through fragrance. Both fresh and floral, the two scents can be worn alternately—alone at different times to enhance a variety of moods and moments—or the pair can be worn simultaneously on different parts of the body to harmonise and amplify their aspects.

title: LOEWE Agua Drop x Lladró
description:
This limited-edition flask of LOEWE Agua Drop EDP has been created in collaboration between LOEWE Perfumes and Spanish ceramics brand, LLADRÓ. ​
The signature LOEWE block-shaped flask is crafted in blue glass, topped by a handcrafted, porcelain flower cap hand-painted in blue, with a pale green calyx.​

title: LOEWE 001 Woman x Lladró
description:
This limited-edition flask of LOEWE 001 Woman EDP has been created in collaboration between LOEWE Perfumes and Spanish porcelain brand, LLADRÓ. ​
The signature LOEWE block-shaped flask is crafted in translucent glass, topped by a handcrafted, porcelain white flower cap, hand-painted with a pale green calyx.​
